info.title: Mouser APIs
info.description: With Mouser's APIs, you can get quick and reliable access to product data as well as cart and ordering capabilities.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine country code. If provided, country code will be used to determine shipping rules.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the default currency code based on the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency code. If provided, currency code will be used to price the cart.

post.summary: Updates the entire cart. If any part numbers are not included with the request, they will be deleted.

parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine country code. If provided, country code will be used to determine shipping rules.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the default currency code based on the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency code. If provided, currency code will be used to price the cart.

post.summary: Allows one or more part numbers to be added to the cart

parameters.name: currencyCode

post.summary: Updates the cart items sent in with the request.

post.summary: Removes an item from the cart based on mouser part number.

post.summary: Allows adding schedule delivery(s) for cart items.
Allows updating schedule delivery(s) for cart items.
Allows deleting all scheduled deliveries for cart items.

get.summary: Returns Order History by date filter

parameters.name: dateFilter
parameters.description: e.g. None, All, Today, Yesterday, ThisWeek, LastWeek, ThisMonth, LastMonth, ThisQuarter, LastQuarter, ThisYear, LastYear or YearToDate

get.summary: Returns Order History by date range
Returns order details for the supplied sales order number.
Returns order details for the supplied web order number.

post.summary: Returns available shipping methods, payment methods, tax certificates, VAT accounts, and saved credit cards for the account.

get.summary: Returns a list of available currencies based on the billing address and default shipping address associated with the account.

parameters.name: shippingCountryCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the default shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency results.

get.summary: Returns a list of countries plus any state/provinces the countries have.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Optional. Allows the country list to be filtered by country code.

post.summary: Submits a new order if the "SubmitOrder" property is set to true. If the "SubmitOrder" property is set to false, then an order summary will be returned.
Submits a new order from an old order and if the "SubmitOrder" property is set to true. If the "SubmitOrder" property is set to false, then an order summary will be returned.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine country code. If provided, country code will be used to determine shipping rules.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the default currency code based on the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency code. If provided, currency code will be used to price the cart.

get.summary: Returns order details for the supplied web order number.

post.summary: Creates new cart from an order.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine country code. If provided, country code will be used to determine shipping rules.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Optional. If not provided, the default currency code based on the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency code. If provided, currency code will be used to price the cart.

post.summary: Search parts by keyword and return a maximum of 50 parts. Please review the SearchByKeywordRequest item in the Models section below to view the detailed description of request parameters.

This method is deprecated, please use api/v2/search/keywordandmanufacturer.
Search parts by keyword and specific manufacturer. Return a maximum of 50 parts. Please review the SearchByKeywordMfrRequest item in the Models section below to view the detailed description of request parameters.
Search parts by part number and return a maximum of 50 parts. Please review the SearchByPartRequest item in the Models section below to view the detailed description of request parameters.

This method is deprecated, please use api/v2/search/partnumberandmanufacturer.
Search parts by part number and specific manufacturer. Return a maximum of 50 parts. Please review the SearchByPartMfrRequest item in the Models section below to view the detailed description of request parameters.

get.summary:
This method is deprecated, please use api/v2/search/manufacturerlist.
Get all Manufacturer List.  Return Manufacturer Name and Manufacturer ID.

OrderInitializeRequest.description:
The billing address associated with this account will be used.
Shipping Address is optional. If a shipping address is not provided, the default shipping address associated with this account will be used.

ShippingAddress.description: Comments here won't show up in swagger docs UI page for some reason

CurrencyCode.description: Optional. If not provided, the default currency code based on the billing/shipping address associated with the account will be used to determine currency code.

CartKey.description: Optional. However, if a cart key is provided, more accurate shipping methods will be returned, plus shipping rates.

PostalCode.description: Required for certain countries. Max length is dependent upon country. China for example has a max length of 6. Default max length is 10.
Required for certain countries. Max length is dependent upon country. China for example has a max length of 6. Default max length is 10.

OrderRequestType.description:
The billing address associated with this account will be used.
Shipping Address is optional. If a shipping address is not provided, the default shipping address associated with this account will be used.

VatInvoiceAddress.description: Optional. For RMB orders only. If not provided, the billing address associated with the account will be used if there is not a VAT Invoice Address already on the account.

UseRfcNumber.description: Required only if shipping to Mexico. Do you have an RFC Number?

VatNumberValidForEuShipments.description: Is this number valid for EU intra-Community shipments?

SearchByKeywordRequest.description: Search parts by keyword and return a maximum of 50 parts.

records.description: Used to specify how many records the method should return.

startingRecord.description: Indicates where in the total recordset the return set should begin. From the startingRecord, the number of records specified will be returned up to the end of the recordset. This is useful for paging through the complete recordset of parts matching keyword.

searchOptions.description: Optional.  If not provided, the default is None.  Refers to options supported by the search engine.  Only one value at a time is supported. Available options:  None | Rohs | InStock | RohsAndInStock - can use string representations or integer IDs: 1[None] | 2[Rohs] | 4[InStock] | 8[RohsAndInStock].

searchWithYourSignUpLanguage.description: Optional. If not provided, the default is false.  Used when searching for keywords in the language specified when you signed up for Search API. Can use string representation: true.

SearchByKeywordMfrRequest.description: Search parts by keyword and specific manufacturer. Return a maximum of 50 parts.

manufacturerId.description: Used for filtering by a specific manufacturer. Please get the manufacturerId from the GetManufacturerList method.

records.description: Used to specify how many records the method should return.

startingRecord.description: Indicates where in the total recordset the return set should begin. From the startingRecord, the number of records specified will be returned up to the end of the recordset. This is useful for paging through the complete recordset of parts matching keyword.

searchOptions.description: Optional.  If not provided, the default is None.  Refers to options supported by the search engine.  Only one value at a time is supported. Available options:  None | Rohs | InStock | RohsAndInStock - can use string representations or integer IDs: 1[None] | 2[Rohs] | 4[InStock] | 8[RohsAndInStock].

searchWithYourSignUpLanguage.description: Optional. If not provided, the default is false.  Used when searching for keywords in the language specified when you signed up for Search API. Can use string representation: true.

SearchByPartRequest.description: Search parts by part number and return a maximum of 50 parts.

mouserPartNumber.description: Used to search parts by the specific Mouser part number with a maximum input of 10 part numbers, separated by a pipe symbol for the search. Each part number must be a minimum of 3 characters and a maximum of 40 characters. For example: 494-JANTX2N2222A|610-2N2222-TL|637-2N2222A

partSearchOptions.description:
Optional.  If not provided, the default is None.  Refers to options supported by the search engine. Only one value at a time is supported. 
The following values are valid: None | Exact - can use string representations or integer IDs: 1[None] | 2[Exact]

SearchByPartMfrRequest.description: Search parts by part number and specific manufacturer. Return a maximum of 50 parts.

manufacturerId.description: Used for filtering by a specific manufacturer. Please get the manufacturerId from the GetManufacturerList method.

mouserPartNumber.description: Used to search parts by the specific Mouser part number with a maximum input of 10 part numbers, separated by a pipe symbol for the search. Each part number must be a minimum of 3 characters and a maximum of 40 characters. For example: 494-JANTX2N2222A|610-2N2222-TL|637-2N2222A

partSearchOptions.description:
Optional.  If not provided, the default is None.  Refers to options supported by the search engine. Only one value at a time is supported. 
The following values are valid: None | Exact - can use string representations or integer IDs: 1[None] | 2[Exact]
